core_meaning: Opposition between Mercury and Saturn faces polarity/awareness. Mercury: analysis, communication, commerce, learning, tech. Saturn: discipline, structure, time, limits, dharma via effort. General tenor: mixed; outcome depends on maturity, timing, and context.

facets.career: Negotiation, analytics, documentation, skilling.  Authority via mastery, long-term credibility. Emphasis: polarity/awareness.
facets.relationships: Dialog, problem-solving, curiosity.  Commitment realism, boundaries, duty. Emphasis: polarity/awareness.
facets.money: Trading, freelancing, multi-stream income, contracts.  Slow steady accrual, austerity, debt realism. Emphasis: polarity/awareness.
facets.health_adj: Nervous system, breath, routine mobility.  Bones, teeth, chronic load; routines & posture. Emphasis: polarity/awareness.

risk_notes: Friction escalating into conflict; respect pacing and boundaries.
Burnout via over-responsibility; schedule recovery windows.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Saturn: structure, commit, audit; tone: polarity/awareness).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Saturn: structure, commit, audit; tone: polarity/awareness).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Saturn: structure, commit, audit; tone: polarity/awareness).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Saturn: structure, commit, audit; tone: polarity/awareness).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Saturn: structure, commit, audit; tone: polarity/awareness).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Mercury: draft, analyze, negotiate; Saturn: structure, commit, audit; tone: polarity/awareness).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.
